statements: UPDATE player_statistics SET win_count = 10, loss_count = 5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_statistics SET kill_count = 25, win_count = 15 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_statistics SET win_count = win_count + 1, loss_count = loss_count + 1 WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE player_statistics SET kill_count = 10 WHERE player_id = 456
UPDATE player_stats SET loss_count = loss_count + 1 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE match_results SET win = true, match_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE match_id = 54321;
UPDATE player_stats SET win_count=5, loss_count=3 WHERE player_id=100
UPDATE match_results SET win=FALSE WHERE match_id=1
UPDATE player_stats SET win_count = 10 WHERE player_id = 'a48aa7cd-3ff2-45c6-b67b-5ca7792d53d0';
UPDATE match_history SET match_result = 'Win' WHERE match_id = '84826f7a-19e4-4dc2-bc12-62f76acd17f0';
UPDATE player_stats SET win_count = win_count + 1, loss_count = loss_count - 1 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_kills SET kill_count = kill_count + 2, kill_date = NOW() WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND match_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_statistics SET loss_count = loss_count + 1 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_info SET player_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_statistics SET win_count = 10, loss_count = 5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_kills SET kill_count = 20 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE players SET win_count = win_count + 1, loss_count = loss_count - 1 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE matches SET match_result = 'Win' WHERE match_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE players SET win_count = win_count + 1, loss_count = loss_count - 1 WHERE player_id = 'c48e6312-63c2-48a2-8187-13b73a0ef654';
UPDATE match_players SET team_id = '57b0eb81-2764-43e8-8724-c219f47a6d92' WHERE match_id = 'e0b25029-726d-4314-b289-bb0d1e8fe065';
